phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Neon Genesis Evangelion
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Mune no door wo tataitemo
Tear open the door to your heart...
Watashidake wo tada mitsumete
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Hohoenderu anata
Standing there smiling serenely.
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Unmei sae mada shiranai
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
Dakedo itsuka kizuku deshou
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Haruka mirai mezasu tameno
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Zankoku na tenshi no thesis
The cruel angel's thesis bleeds...
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
Kono sora wo daite kagayaku.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare.
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
15 years earlier
Anno Domini 2000
Father...
Thanks,
Shinji, you really saved us from that rainstorm.
Where is Misato?
I guess she must still be asleep.
She is been working all night recently.
That is right, she has a tough job.
We have got to be quiet.
Do not wake her up.
What are you doing in here?!
Taking shelter from the rain.
You guys are after me, are not you?
Well, I am changing and if you peep, I will kill you!
Shut up, idiot!
Who would want to see you changing clothes?!
She is way too self-conscious.
Sorry for disturbing you!
Hi, how is it going?
Shinji, do not be late tonight, we are having a harmonics test.
Right.
Did you hear that, Asuka?
Yes, Madam!
Congratulations on your promotion!
Congratulations!
Thank you.
See you later.
See you!
What is up?
Did something happen to Misato?
Did not you see her badge?
The number of lines increased to two.
That means that she is been promoted from Captain to Major.
Really?
I did not notice that.
Yeah, I wonder when...
Are you serious?
What a bunch of dweebs!
Have not you got any sympathy?
Do not you know how hard it is to foster two jr.
High kids at her age?
We are the only ones who have some human compassion.
Units 00 and 02 are both on the edge of the contamination zone.
They have reached their limit.
Unit 01 can still tolerate a little more though, cannot he?
Lower the graph depth another 0.3.
He is almost reached the contamination zone.
And he is still getting these readings?
He is wonderful.
His harmonics and sync ratio are rapidly catching up with Asuka's.
It is a talent, is not it?
He was born to pilot an Eva, was not he?
Not that he wants to.
I know he is not happy.
Test completed.
Good work.
Excellent work, Shinji.
What do you mean?
Your harmonics value increased by eight points since the last test.
That is very good.
But still it is fifty points lower than mine!
Yes, but he increased it by eight points in only ten days.
That is really something.
It is not so great!
Are you happy with your little praise?
I am going home now!
Idiot!
Having your girlfriend dump you is not really such a big deal.
Congratulations on your promotion.
Having your girlfriend dump you is not really such a big deal.
Thanks.
When I was a kid, everyone lived in dirty huts and barely had food.
But I am not really all that thrilled.
When I was a kid, everyone lived in dirty huts and barely had food.
But I am not really all that thrilled.
We could not really afford to be depressed about relationships.
I understand.
We could not really afford to be depressed about relationships.
I am not happy when I get praised either.
We could not really afford to be depressed about relationships.
All it does is make Asuka angry.
We could not really afford to be depressed about relationships.
All it does is make Asuka angry.
You should be glad your parents are alive and you have food to eat.
You should be glad your parents are alive and you have food to eat.
I do not know why she gets so mad.
Only now in these better, peaceful times do you have such hardships.
Only now in these better, peaceful times do you have such hardships.
That bothers you?
Only now in these better, peaceful times do you have such hardships.
That bothers you?
You got that, Mr. Waaa?
Yes.
You got that, Mr. Waaa?
That is because you always watch everyone else's faces.
You got that, Mr. Waaa?
That is because you always watch everyone else's faces.
Congratulations!
Thanks, guys!
Thank you, Mister Suzuhara.
No, no.
This was not my brainchild, it was this guy right here.
That is right!
I, Kensuke Aida was the planner!
Thank you, Mister Aida.
By the way, why is the class rep here?
Because I invited her.
Right?
Rei too?
Yes, I invited her,
but that girl is one strange customer.
Darn, why is Mister Kaji so late?
Oh, is Mister Kaji that really cool guy?
Oh, yeah!
He is so much better than these dweebs that it is like night and day.
It is an insult to compare him to them.
What did you say?!
How dare you?
Is it still difficult for you to be here
in this kind of situation?
I am okay.
I am just not used to being with
so many people.
Why do they have to
make so much noise like that?
Your promotion...
That means someone noticed the work you have been doing, right?
Yeah, I suppose.
That is why they are happy.
But you do not look very happy at all.
Oh, I am happy.
I am.
But that is not the reason I work here.
Then why did you join NERV?
Well, I do not remember.
It is been a long time since then.
That is got to be Kaji!
I came directly from HQ.
We just happened to meet on the way.
That is rather suspicious.
Hey, are you jealous?
Absolutely not.
Anyhow, I would like to give you my fondest regards, Major Katsuragi.
I suppose I will have to be polite to you from now on.
What are you trying to say, you jerk?
It is unprecedented for both the Commander and Vice-Commander
to leave Japan together.
I guess they must really count on old Katsuragi here.
My father's not here?
Commander Ikari is at the South Pole at the moment.
Nothing living can exist in the world of death we call Antarctica.
Or should I simply call it Hell?
Nevertheless, we, Mankind, are here.
We are living things, and we are alive.
That is because we are under the protection of science.
Science is the power of Man.
That arrogance is what caused the tragedy of fifteen years ago,
the Second Impact.
And here is the end result.
This is a greater punishment than we deserve.
This is the real Dead Sea.
Yet this is a world that has been purified, purged of the original sin.
I would rather live in a world where people can live,
no matter how stained with sin.
Report from the bridge.
Telegram received from NERV Headquarters.
An Angel has been detected in orbit above the Indian Ocean.
The Angel appeared suddenly, two minutes ago.
Send Search Satellite Number 6 to that orbit.
T-minus two minutes to contact.
The target has been sighted.
That is impressive.
I do not believe it.
Satellite Number 6 is closing for contact with the target.
Start data search.
Data transmission commencing.
Reception confirmed.
Was that an AT Field?
It is a new way of using it.
What incredibly destructive power.
That is an AT Field!
It uses kinetic energy too.
This Angel is, itself, like a huge bomb.
In any case, the first blast missed its target and hit the Pacific.
Two hours later, the second shot struck there.
Since then, it has been steadily correcting the error ratio.
That means it is learning.
An N2 air bomb had no effect on it.
The Angel has been missing since then.
It is probably coming here.
Yes, and next time it may drop itself.
So, that will give us a third Ashinoko lake?
All five Fuji lakes will be fused into a single body linked to the Pacific,
destroying this Headquarters in the process.
Can we reach the Commander?
It is impossible due to the Angel's powerful jamming.
What is the Magi's judgment?
They unanimously agree in recommending evacuation.
What will you do?
You are the one who is in charge of all this now.
Notify all of the ministries concerned
of this D-17 Declaration as provided for by NERV's authority.
All residents within radius of 50km are to evacuate immediately.
Also, ask Matsushiro to backup the Magi.
Are we going to evacuate as well?
No, but it is not necessary to place everyone at risk.
A D-17 Special Declaration has been made by the government.
All residents must evacuate to their designated locations.
Beginning with the 6th and 7th blocks,
move according to your district chief's direction immediately.
The evacuation of the city is complete.
The evacuation of noncombatant and D Class personnel
by Alarm C has been completed.
Are you serious?
Yes, I am.
You will risk all three Evas with your irresponsible selfishness?
The chance of success is only 0.00001!
That is not even one in ten thousand!
It is not zero.
I just trust the Evas.
Major Katsuragi!
I am in charge.
and destroying Angels is my duty.
Your duty?
You must be kidding.
This is for your own sake, is not it?
This is just your revenge against the Angels!
Neon Genesis Evangelion
Catch it in our hands?
That is right.
We will position the Evas in the estimated drop zone.
You will catch it while maintaining your AT Fields at full strength.
What if the Angel does not come down where you expect it to?
We will be a little put out.
What if the Evas are not able to withstand the shock?
We will be put out in that case too.
What is our probability of success?
God only knows.
I have no idea.
If we succeed, it will be a miracle.
It is not until we have done all we can to cause a miracle that it becomes viable.
You mean, we have got to be willing to sacrifice ourselves?
I am sorry, but we have no other options for this operation.
How can you call this an operation?!
No, you cannot really call it that.
You can refuse to do it, if you wish.
So, are you okay with this?
Regulations say you are supposed to write a will.
Have you done so?
I do not need to.
I am not going to die just yet.
Neither do I.
There is no use for it.
Not me, either.
Again, I am sorry.
But once this is over, I will treat you all to a steak dinner.
What?
Really?
I promise.
What?
Really?
I promise.
I promise.
Yeah!
Yeah!
Do not forget!
Yeah!
Do not forget!
You can count on it.
I guess she thinks a steak dinner is supposed to impress us.
Does she really think a steak dinner will impress us?
The Second Impact generation has really cheap standards.
She cannot help it.
What was with that fake cheer you made?
I just wanted to make her feel a little easier about it.
Now, since she is going to treat us,
I would better figure out where to go.
You have got to join us this time.
No, I will not.
Why not?
I dislike meat.
Because of the Angel's ECM jamming, we have lost track of it.
Since it is impossible to calculate the collision point exactly,
the Magi's estimated a drop zone based on the data
that had been collected before it was lost.
This is it.
The range is this wide?
This is it.
The range is this wide?
The distance from one side to the other is enormous.
Given the size of the target's AT Field,
it could totally annihilate HQ by hitting any of these locations.
Given that, we will disperse the Evas at each of these three points.
And on what grounds is this dispersal based?
Intuition.
Intuition?
Intuition.
Yes, a woman's intuition.
How sloppy!
Our miracle is getting farther and farther away.
Misato has never won the lottery.
Say...
What?
Say...
What?
Asuka, why do you pilot an Eva?
To exhibit my talent to the world, of course.
You mean to prove that you exist?
Yeah, more or less.
You are not going to ask her?
I have asked Ayanami before.
My, how intimate the two of you are.
It is not like that.
Now, what about you, Shinji?
I do not know.
You do not know?
What are you, stupid?
Maybe I am.
I suppose you really are.
Twenty minutes to estimated time of impact.
You must all evacuate now.
I can take care of this myself.
No, this is our job as well.
That is right.
We cannot let the kids risk their lives by themselves.
They will be fine.
No matter how badly the Evas might be damaged,
their AT Fields will protect them.
Inside an Eva is the safest place to be.
Shinji, yesterday you asked me why I joined NERV.
My father was a man who lived for his research,
for his dreams, to the exclusion of all else.
I could never forgive him for that.
In fact, I even hated him.
Just like my father.
He never took care of me, my mother or the family.
His friends always said he was very sensitive and delicate.
But the truth was that he was just a weak person
who did not want to face reality, the reality called his family.
He was like a kid.
So I agreed with my mother when she decided to divorce him,
because she was always crying.
He was depressed about it,
but I laughed at him because he deserved what he got.
But he sacrificed himself
to save my life during the Second Impact.
Then, I did not know whether I hated him or loved him.
The only thing that was clear to me
was I wanted to destroy the Angels who caused the Second Impact.
So, in order to do that, I joined NERV.
It might be that I still hate him, and just want to avenge my father,
so that I can free myself of him.
I must not run away.
I must not run away.
I must not run away.
Right!
I must NOT run away.
The Target has been sighted at maximum magnification.
Distance is approximately 25,000.
Here it is.
All Evas, start your engines.
All we have is a rough estimated trajectory from optical sightings.
So the Magi will guide you until the distance is 10,000 meters.
After that, you will have to use your own judgment.
I am placing my trust in you.
The Angel is approaching, distance 20,000.
Commence operation.
Here we go!
Start!
Distance 12,000!
AT Field, full spread!
Unit 02!
Spread your field!
I am doing it!
Do it now!
Our wireless communications have been restored.
We are receiving a message from Commander Ikari in Antarctica.
Connect him here.
Yes, Madam.
Connect him here.
Yes, Madam.
I am very sorry, Sir.
My irresponsible judgment, has caused Unit 01 to incur damage.
It was completely my fault.
That is not a problem.
Destroying Angels is the Evas' purpose.
It was fortunate that the amount of damage was minimal.
Excellent work, Major Katsuragi.
Thank you, Sir.
And on that subject, is the pilot of Unit 01 there?
Yes!
I have received the report.
Good work, Shinji.
Right!
Now, Major Katsuragi, I will leave the rest of this in your hands.
Yes, Sir.
Next station is New Miyanoshita, New Miyanoshita.
The exit will switch to the left side at the next station.
Now, you are going to have to fulfill your promise.
Of course!
I have withdrawn enough I can even pay for a full French dinner.
Although, before payday comes along again...
Take it easy, we know how poor you are.
This will be fine.
And even Wonder Girl says she will join us for ramen noodles.
I will have a garlic ramen with no roast pork.
I will have shark-fin soup ramen with roast pork.
Large!
There you go!
Say, Misato?
What?
When I heard my father's words today,
I think I finally understood
the good part of being praised by someone.
And I also realized
that the reason I pilot my Eva is to hear those words from him.
That is why you are a pilot?
You really are an idiot.
To be continued...
Preview
After a simulated plug activation
trouble occurs, and Central Dogma is invaded.
NERV is forced to accept a course of self-destruction.
Next time, fan service!
